data.name: AddAPersonalMessage
data.value: Add a personal message (psst… it’s ok to brag, this is a true achievement! :)

data.name: AddAPersonalMessagePerhaps
data.value: Add a personal message - perhaps ask your friends to join your clan.

data.name: AKingdomOfAMightyFortress
data.value: a {5} kingdom of {4} mighty fortresses! All Hail {1} {2}!

data.name: AreYOUReadyForAnAdventure
data.value: Are YOU ready for an adventure of your life?? THEN JOIN {2}\\'s CLAN and claim the throne of your own kingdom!!

data.name: CONGRATSTOForMakingThis
data.value: CONGRATS TO {2} for making this critical strategic decision!

data.value: {2} conquered a new Castle in REALM OF EMPIRES!!

data.name: DueToTremendousAcheivements
data.value: Due to {3} tremendous achievements, the Council Of Elders has granted {2} a new title and {4} {6} accepted! ALL HAIL {5}!

data.value: Due to {3} tremendous achievements, the Council Of Elders has granted {2} a new title of {8} and {4} {6} accepted! ALL HAIL {5}!

data.value: {5} has accepted a new title in REALM OF EMPIRES!!

data.value: {5} has accepted a new title of {8} in REALM OF EMPIRES!!

data.name: HasBeenGrantedAndAccepted
data.value: {2} has been granted and has accepted the first noble title of {1} with all the rights and privileges

data.name: IInviteYouToJoinMyClan
data.value: *** I invite you to join my clan as we prepare for a adventure of a life time - our quest to rule the realm! Join me!***.

data.name: InABloodyBattleFearlessSoldiers
data.value: In a bloody battle {2}\\'s fearless soldiers stormed and captured a new Castle!! {2} now rules over

data.name: InauguratedIntoRoENobility
data.value: {2} has been inaugurated into Realm of Empires Nobility!

data.name: IsLeadingABrandNewClan
data.value: {1} is leading {2}, a brand new clan in REALM OF EMPIRES!!

data.name: JoiningAClanIsACriticalStep
data.value: Joining a clan (a federation of independent kingdoms) is a critical step in ensuring security for your kingdom in Realm of Empires.

data.name: JoinUsInCongratulating
data.value: Join us in congratulating {3} by attending the celebration!

data.name: JustJoinedAClanInRoE
data.value: {1} just joined {3}, a clan in REALM OF EMPIRES!!

data.name: LeadingAClanIsAGreatHonor
data.value: Leading a clan is a great honor, responsibility and an exciting challenge! Hundreds of players depend on the strategic and

data.name: PleaseVisitTheCelebration
data.value: Please visit the celebration feast made in {2}\\' honor! {7}

data.name: RoEIsAnRTGAndItTakesWeeks
data.value: Realm of Empires is a real time game and it takes weeks to achieve this title, making it a true honor! It takes keen strategic planning, diplomatic know-how and patience as one struggles to maintain control of and expand their Kingdom. At any point in time, with one or two wrong diplomatic moves, one risks total defeat – but no matter what fortune may bring, a title, once bestowed and accepted is yours forever!

data.name: RoETakesManyMonthsToAchieve
data.value: Realm of Empires is a real time game where it takes many months to achieve the grand title of {0}! It is a true honor! {2} {0} has proven {1} as a great commander with acute strategic and diplomatic sense. {2} {0} directly controls a vast territory, and influences the political and diplomatic landscape of the realm. But even {3} {0} is not completely secure and needs friends and allies or {4} risk loosing it all!

data.name: TheretoAppertainingIsNowAMember
data.value: thereto appertaining. {2} is now a member of the select elite of Realm of Empires! {2}\\'s subjects have organized a splendid feast in {4} honor.

data.name: AcceptedANewTitlePublishStoryFacebookProfile
data.value:
You have accepted a new title! We would like to publish a story to your facebook profile about this achievement.

In addition to sharing this honor with your friends, publishing stories helps us grow and keeps the game vibrant and interesting!

Thank you in advance for sharing Realm Of Empires with others!

data.name: CONGRATSAssertYourSovereignty
data.value:
CONGRATULATIONS!

You're almost done! Assert your sovereignty - throw a royal feast! Let everyone know who is in charge!

data.name: CongratsOnFormingNewClan
data.value:
Congratulations on forming your new clan!!!

Leading a clan is an exciting challenge!

The first step in leading a successful clan is growing its ranks. We suggest you publish a story to your facebook profile telling your friends of this event and inviting them to join your clan.

data.name: CongratsOnJoiningAClan
data.value:
Congratulations joining a clan!

Joining a clan is the single most important decision you can make!

There is nothing stronger than a large clan of friends. We suggest you publish a story to your facebook profile telling your friends of this event and inviting them to join your clan.

Remember! Growing the clan's ranks is not just the leaders responsibility but also yours. Don't let your clan mates down! Publish this story to invite your friends to the clan.

data.name: CongratsProvingYourselfAsGreatWarLeader
data.value:
Congratulations!

Your subjects tell us, that just a little while ago, you proved yourself as a great war leader when you captured a new village!

Your subjects are throwing you a splendid celebration feast! Let the world know your glory, and invite your friends to join the celebration feast by publishing a story!

data.name: NewTitlePublishToYourFacebookProfile
data.value:
You have accepted a new title! We would like to publish a story to your facebook profile about this achievement which also invites your friends to a Celebration Feast in you honor.

Remember that publishing stories helps us grow and keeps the game vibrant and interesting. Many thanks from Realm Of Empires team!

data.name: PublishAStoryBecauseYouJoinedRealm3
data.value:
Publish a story to your profile telling your friends you joined realm 3.

The more people join early on, the more exciting the game! and publishing stories is a very pleasant, non-intrusive way of inviting your friends.

We are commited to only publishing stories you are fully aware - clicking the link below will allow you to preview the story and then YOU can decide if you want to post it.

THANK YOU IN ADVANCE!!

data.name: YouHaveAcceptedFirstNobleTitle
data.value:
You have accepted the first noble title and hence have became part of a select elite of Realm Of Empires, the Nobility!

We would like to publish a special story to your facebook profile about this achievement which also invites your friends to a Celebration Feast in you honor.

Publishing stories helps us grow and keeps the game vibrant and interesting. Please allow us to publish this story and as a thank you for your effort and good will, please accept this
